mapper.insert: insert into qa_question ( qa_question_title, member_id, member_nick, qa_question_content, qa_question_viewcnt , qa_question_date, open_yn, qa_question_category , originNo, groupOrd, groupLayer, qa_question_answer) values ( #{qa_question_title}, #{member_id}, #{member_nick}, #{qa_question_content}, 0 , now(), #{open_yn}, #{qa_question_category} , #{originNo}, #{groupOrd}+1, #{groupLayer}+1, 'Y')
mapper.update:
update qa_question set qa_question_answer = 'Y'
where originNo = #{originNo} and groupOrd = '0' and groupLayer = '0'
mapper.select: select qa_question_id, qa_question_category, qa_question_title, qa.member_id, qa.member_nick ,qa_question_content, qa_question_date, qa_question_viewcnt, open_yn ,originNo, groupOrd, groupLayer from qa_question qa, member m where qa.qa_question_id = #{qa_question_id} and qa.member_id = m.member_id

select qa_question_id, qa_question_category, qa_question_title, qa.member_id, qa.member_nick ,qa_question_date, qa_question_viewcnt, open_yn , originNo, groupOrd, groupLayer from qa_question qa, member m where qa.member_nick = m.member_nick
and qa.qa_question_title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.member_nick like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by originNo desc, groupOrd asc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select count(qa.qa_question_id) cnt from qa_question qa, member m where qa.member_nick = m.member_nick
and qa.qa_question_title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.member_nick like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
